data.name: DefaultStatus
data.value: Left mouse button: select object; Right mouse button: move map; Scroll wheel: zoom in/out

data.name: DefaultRectangle
data.value: Left mouse button: move/size rectangle; Right mouse button: move map; Scroll wheel: zoom in/out

data.name: DragObject
data.value: Hold down left mouse button and drag to move selected object

data.name: DragCorner
data.value: Hold down left mouse button and drag corner point to move it

data.name: DraggingObject
data.value: Move object to desired location and release mouse button

data.name: DraggingCorner
data.value: Move corner point to desired location and release mouse button

data.name: AddingControl
data.value: Click left mouse button to place new control

data.name: AddingExistingControl
data.value: Click left mouse button to add existing control "{0}" to course

data.name: AddingStart
data.value: Click left mouse button to place new start

data.name: AddingExistingStart
data.value: Click left mouse button to add existing start to course

data.name: AddingFinish
data.value: Click left mouse button to place new finish

data.name: AddingExistingFinish
data.value: Click left mouse button to add existing finish to course

data.name: AddingCrossingPoint
data.value: Click left mouse button to place new mandatory crossing point

data.name: AddingExistingCrossingPoint
data.value: Click left mouse button to add existing mandatory crossing point to course

data.name: AddingObject
data.value: Click left mouse button to place new object

data.name: AddingBend
data.value: Click left mouse button at the location of the bend

data.name: AddingCorner
data.value: Click left mouse button to add a new corner

data.name: DeletingBend
data.value: Click left mouse button on a bend to remove it

data.name: DeletingCorner
data.value: Click left mouse button on a corner to remove it

data.name: AddingControlGap
data.value: Click left mouse button on the control circle to add a small gap; hold down left mouse button and drag to create a large gap

data.name: RemovingControlGap
data.value: Click left mouse button on a gap in the control circle to remove it

data.name: AddingLegGap
data.value: Click left mouse button to create small gap; hold down left mouse button and drag to create a large gap in the leg

data.name: RemovingLegGap
data.value: Click left mouse button on a gap in the leg to remove it

data.name: SizeRectangle
data.value: Hold down left mouse button and drag to size the selected object

data.name: SizingRectangle
data.value: Move edge(s) to desired location and release mouse button

data.name: AddingDescription
data.value: Hold down left mouse button and drag to create control descriptions

data.name: RotatingObject
data.value: Click left mouse button when the crossing point is rotated to the correct angle

data.name: AddingLineArea
data.value: Hold down left mouse button and drag to add a line segment; click the left mouse button to finish adding object

data.name: AddingText
data.value: Hold down left mouse button and drag to create text

data.name: AddingExistingMapExchange
data.value: Click left mouse button to add existing map exchange to course

data.name: AddingMapExchange
data.value: Click left mouse button to place new map exchange
